Role and Primary Interest: A mining company that has been operating in central BC since the 1950’s and can help provide data and facilitate remediation work.
Local wildlife consultants in the watershed to consider for future work.
A road design and maintenance company at the roadway-watershed interface.
Local wildlife consultants in the watershed to consider for future work.

Individual or Organization Name: Freshwater Fisheries Society of British Columbia
Role and Primary Interest: This group can provide project assistance with non-anadromous species.
A biologist and local wildlife consultant in the watershed.
These individuals can facilitate construction as well as consent/facilitate complimentary works on private property to improve fish habitat upstream and downstream.

Individual or Organization Name: Ministry of Forests, Lands and Natural Resource Operations (FLNRO)
Role and Primary Interest: FLNRO can assist with providing local knowledge, data, expertise and can facilitate remediation work.
MOTI may own barriers and can play a role in improving and replacing barriers at highway crossings.

Individual or Organization Name: Property owners along river and tributaries
Role and Primary Interest: These individuals can facilitate construction as well as consent/facilitate complimentary works on private property to improve fish habitat upstream and downstream.
This group can help with field assessments and project implementation.

A local consultant (Steve Hocquard Consulting) that provided valuable review of barrier and habitat data to inform the spatial models used in this plan, and can help with field assessments and project implementation.
A privately owned Canadian forest products company that maintains forest service road-stream crossings in the Horsefly River watershed.
This group can be contacted for advice and assistance.
A integrated forestry and diversified wood products company that maintains forest service road-stream crossings in the Horsefly River watershed.
